```{r}
library(lterdatasampler)
library(tidyverse)
library(kableExtra)

#| fig-cap: "this is my caption


pie_crab <- lterdatasampler::pie_crab

ggplot(data = pie_crab, aes(x = latitude, y = size)) +
  geom_point()
```

```{r}
crab_table <- pie_crab %>%
  group_by(site) %>% 
  summarise(carapace_mean = mean(size, na.rm = TRUE), 
            carapace_sd = sd(size, na.rm = TRUE),
            count = n())

mutated_crab_table <- crab_table %>%
  rename(Site = "site",
         "Carapace Mean" = "carapace_mean",
         "Carapace Standard Deviation" = "carapace_sd",
         "Frequency" = "count")

kable(mutated_crab_table,
      width = 2)




print(crab_table)

```
